label: Job Search
description: Online platforms and agencies that help job seekers find employment opportunities.

subcategories.label: Part-time Jobs
subcategories.description: Employment opportunities with less than 40 hours per week.

subcategories.label: Full-time Jobs
subcategories.description: Employment opportunities with 40 hours or more per week.

subcategories.label: Apprenticeships
subcategories.description: Training programs that combine on-the-job training with classroom instruction.

subcategories.label: Driving Jobs
subcategories.description: Employment opportunities that require driving skills.

subcategories.label: Creative Jobs
subcategories.description: Employment opportunities that require artistic or design skills.

subcategories.label: Hospitality Jobs
subcategories.description: Employment opportunities in the hospitality industry.

subcategories.label: Retail Jobs
subcategories.description: Employment opportunities in the retail industry.

subcategories.label: Temporary Jobs
subcategories.description: Employment opportunities that last for a limited time.

subcategories.label: Entry-level Jobs
subcategories.description: Employment opportunities for people with little or no work experience.

subcategories.label: Remote Jobs
subcategories.description: Employment opportunities that allow working from home or other remote locations.
